thread.title: Some discipline is in order
thread.title_full: Some discipline is in order - The Washington Post

author: John Woodrow Cox
title: Some discipline is in order
text:
Rep. Paul Ryan (R-Wis.). (Win McNamee/Getty Images) October 25 at 8:16 PM Now that the latest three-ring circus is over [“ Benghazi business as usual ,” editorial, Oct. 23; “ Biden ends speculation: No 2016 run ,” front page, Oct. 22; “ Ryan declares official candidacy for House speaker ,” news, Oct. 23], I hope it’s not asking too much for the children on Capitol Hill to do three simple things:
First, let the government pay its debts. Second, keep the government open. Third, don’t mess anything else up — just go to your rooms until January.
That shouldn’t be too hard, should it?
Robert F. Allnutt , Bethesda
